snippet: Robert Schroeder, a Republican from Washington Township in Bergen County, said his military-contracting business had been “in decline during the Obama administration.”
lead_paragraph: Robert Schroeder, a Republican from Washington Township in Bergen County, said his military-contracting business had been “in decline during the Obama administration.”

headline.seo: New Jersey Assemblyman Accused of Writing Bad Checks Blames Economy
